alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 19 at 8:54PM CDT until April 20 at 11:40AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Observed flooding changed to Minor severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Alabama... Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Marengo and Hale Counties. .Flooding continues on the Black Warrior River and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by Wednesday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 90.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 PM CDT Tuesday was 90.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage later this evening and continue falling to 80.1 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 90.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
